sen.j: 法栄（ほうえい、生没年不明）は、奈良時代の僧。
sen.e: Hoei was a priest in the Nara period (years of birth and death are unknown).

sen.cmt: ピリオド削除しました。

sen.j: 天平勝宝4年11月に優婆塞宗形部岡足を献上した。
sen.e: In November 752, he presented 優婆塞宗形部岡足.
sen.cmt: 「天平勝宝4年」→752年「優婆塞宗形部岡足」→読み方、意味ともに不明。経典名の当て字かもしれません。原文のまま記載しました。
sen.e: In November 752, he presented 優婆塞宗形部岡足.
In November 752, he presented 優婆塞宗形部岡足.

sen.j: 立性清潔で、病気をよく診、聖武天皇の信任を得たという。
sen.e: He was said to be honest and clean, often looking after patients with diseases, and trusted by the Emperor Shomu.
He is said to have been honest and clean, have often looked after patients with diseases, and have been trusted by Emperor Shomu.
sen.cmt: 時制変更、冠詞削除しました。
sen.e: He is said to have been honest and clean, have often looked after patients with diseases, and have been trusted by Emperor Shomu.

sen.j: 聖武天皇崩御後は人との交わりを絶ち、山陵を守って経を読み続けたという。
sen.e: After the death of the Emperor Shomu, he secluded himself and continued reading scriptures, taking care of the Emperor's tomb.
After the death of Emperor Shomu, he secluded himself from others and continued reading scriptures, taking care of the Emperor's tomb.
sen.cmt: 冠詞削除、from otherを追加しました。
sen.e: After the death of Emperor Shomu, he secluded himself from others and continued reading scriptures, taking care of the Emperor's tomb.
